title: "Fantastic Stay with Exceptional Service and Convenient Location"
desc: "We had a wonderful experience with the team's services and would highly recommend this place to everyone. We do have one request - it would be great if they could consider adding more diverse Indian breakfast options, as the current choices are limited. Additionally, we were extremely impressed with the helpfulness and support provided by the reception team, especially Gopi and Deepika. The location is very convenient, with a bus stop just 100 meters away and the metro station only 500 meters away. This place offers excellent connectivity as well. A stay here is sure to be enjoyable and memorable."

title: Clean and all good.
desc: Good and friendly check in by receptionist from Deepika from India. Room is clean and all works well. Concierge service too. The hotel is nice and clean. Buffet breakfast adequate. Will come back again.

title: Very good experience
desc: As a family of 4, we had a very good time at this hotel! Good location, good services (we loved the infinity pool) and good rooms. Definitely recommended! Also, thanks to Jessica for her lovely help at the check-out.

title: Great property, at a great price
desc: Lots of amenities and the staff are friendly and helpful. Because of last-minute juggling of schedules, we had 3 different bookings. When we arrived, I asked the front desk staff (Deepika) to make sure we didn't have to change rooms over the course of the week. She did an amazing job in accommodation of my request. Also, we had to split part of the stay as business and part as pleasure. Again, the front desk staff was able to bill us accordingly.

title: We love Novotel to our Acccor!
desc: My husband and I stayed at the Novotel for the Formula 1 and it was a very reasonable price for such a busy time of the year. The accomodation was very comfortable, the pools were amazing and the buffet breakfast was top notch. The only downside was the MRT is a 15 minute walk, but the hotel kindly provides a shuttle service that drops guests at the MRT station and Orchard Road‚Ä¶brilliant!

title: Excellent service and very helpful pika n Ramesh re very helpful. In future definetly will stay here .
desc: Hotel is very pleasant. Exceptional services done by Deepika and Ramesh, they have provided me a excellent service and helpful and in future i am looking frwd to stay here. Thank you and the amenities are so cool

title: Spot on
desc: Spot on Dining experience was first class staff lovely cant speak highly enough of the team highly recommended food well prepared a nd tasty lovely atmosphere in hotel nothing too much trouble for staff

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Great job!!!!!!!!! #Deepika!!!!!! Love your kind support!!! Will make sure I come back to this hotel my next visit to Singapore!!! Keep up the good job and taking the extra mile!!!!!!!!! Also I love the hotel environment too!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Experience at Novotel & Winestone
desc: The staff were all really nice and accommodating! They will check in if we need anything which we really appreciated throughout our event. We had dinner at the winestone & the chef was super friendly and helpful as well! He made sure we had a special new plate made as we couldnt eat certain foods due to dietary restrictions. Overall 10/10!

title: COMFORTABLE AND NICE STAFF
desc: So comfortable room Room is clean and confotable Location: Near Bus stop and Hotel shuttel bus to MRT somerest every 45 min all day BF not varity but beautiful view (swimming pool) So nice staff (Gopi ,He so nice and helpful) Everything Perfect ü•∞ü´∞Thank you

title: Sweet suite
desc: Amazing hotel service especially with excellent treatment by Edlyn who made my family feel comfortable while waiting for our room to be prepared. It was my family's first time booking a suite and this is a very good choice to experience that.

title: Check in was challenging
desc: I am an Accor member and have stayed in many of their hotels around the world. So I mentioned my challenging check in experience in the guest survey. Kudos to Agnes the Duty Manager who reacted immediately, reached out to me with a few hours of my arrival and more than rectified the situation. Beyond that the hotel is what you would expect from a Novotel. Great location, great rooms, restaurants and bars. Modern and efficient. Of course it is always people that create results. Thank you Agnes !

title: Wonderful Staff.
desc: The Breakfast Staff were wonderful- especially the warm Filipinos. Very helpful and efficient. The location is more residential than commercial. The shuttle driver was quite rude. Room needs improvement for the price we paid.

title: Unbelievably Good Service!
desc: Honestly one of the most amazing experiences I have had from a Novotel. From the moment my colleague and I walked in, we were greeted with such smiles and humans who were just happy to be. One day of my stay also happened to be my birthday and I was treated to the sweetest woman you can meet, Sofia who exuded such professionalism and made the start of my day super special. The hotels is very modern, beds are super comfy, the pool is nice, great food options around, the list goes on! I honestly cannot rate this hotel anymore.

title: Spacious and comfy
desc: Stayed at the suite for our wedding. 2 nights. The room is sufficiently large and spacious, though the bathroom is visible for the bedroom through a glass panel (romantic!). Service was good as well.

title: Outstanding service throughout our stay!
desc: This was a too-short overnight stay, but the service was impeccable throughout. The room was clean and modern, Gopi (in training, hahaha) was lovely at check-in, and we really also appreciated outstanding service from Agnes, Adeline, Farhan and Glenn in the lounge and at the restaurant. We‚Äôll be back!

title: Another great stay at the Novotel on Stevens
desc: This was probably my 5th stay at this hotel this year and they continue to provide the highest quality services, friendly staff, comfortable and clean rooms. A special shout out goes to their Club Lounge team of Glenn, Sofia, Edlyn, and Anthony. They always greet with a great smile, helpful and efficient check-in, checkout, and club lounge services. This team deserves special recognition for making everyone's stay pleasurable and memorable. Thank you.

title: Awesome Hospitality
desc: Checkin was smooth and swift! Front desk manager Agnes was able to ready the room ahead so much earlier than the check in time which was awesome! Also got a sweet surprise as she gave me the access to Privilege Lounge üòÅ‚Ä¶. Didn‚Äôt realize there‚Äôre quite number of restaurants around which is really convenient! Will definitely come back again.

title: It's awesome experience
desc: It was a pleasant experience. Very kind stall. Especially Deepika was very receptive. She had guided us on routes and good food spots in Singapore etc. Over all a very pleasant experience. Break fast was good, But would like to have Indian varieties as well

title: Wonderful üëç
desc: Wonderful stay. Great and very helpful service from staff Deepika üëçüëçüëç Will definitely stay here again on our next singapore visit. Location is good, hotel is clean, near to shopping area, and staff are friendly

title: GOING THE EXTRA MILE
desc: Hello to Asher on Reception and Gopi who is learning his trade from the Best. The difference between a good and bad experience are staff who listen and do everything in their power to make it better. My whole experience from beginning to end at the Novatel on Stevens was exceptional. We have travelled to many parts of Europe in the past few weeks, staying in many hotels.. and I would recommend The Novatel and your staff to anyone who is listening. Thanks again to Asher for going the extra mile and of course the lovely Gopi who will be a star..

title: Pleasant stay
desc: I had made this booking last minute and it was a very smooth check in process. I was greeted by Nagarajan from the front desk and the entire check in process was very quick. He was presentable and greeted well. Hotel room were well maintained and super nice: only downside the room service food quality can be improved. And infinity pool can be much cleaner especially where we‚Äôre seated. I was greeted by Gopi and Sofia on my check out - very warmth hospitality and smooth check out. It‚Äôs nice to be greeted by smiley faces. A warm front desk team.
